alert.note: Alert for Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 11:30PM CDT until August 03 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR LINCOLN...NORTHERN MARATHON...SOUTHEASTERN ONEIDA AND WESTERN LANGLADE COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Crystal Lake Scout Reservation to 8 miles north of Parrish to Dutch Corners to 10 miles southwest of Council Grounds State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Antigo, Rhinelander, Merrill, Rib Mountain, Tomahawk, Harrison, Parrish, Gilbert and Council Grounds State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
